tool_description: Amazon Data Scraper is the easiest way to get access to product, price, sales, and reviews data from amazon in JSON format.
name: DRS Amazon Data Scraper
title: DRS Amazon Data Scraper

api_list.name: Get Amazon Product Details
api_list.description: Send a request to get details of products from amazon.com.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://drs-amazon-data-scraper.p.rapidapi.com/products/B0B3C2R8MP"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "drs-amazon-data-scraper.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://drs-amazon-data-scraper.p.rapidapi.com/products/{productid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "drs-amazon-data-scraper.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
